    Main() - Constructor for class Main
     
    MajorEvent() - Method in class StockMarket
    Triggers a random major market event, which significantly affects the price and updates the market sentiment and news.
    makeDecision() - Method in class Buyer
    Makes a decision based on trend score, trust, and random variation.
    makeDecision() - Method in class RandomBuyer
    Makes a completely random decision to sell or buy (if allowed), otherwise holds.
    MakeNormal() - Method in class Buyer

    market - Variable in class BuyerFactory
    Reference to the stock market simulation.
    marketBias - Variable in class StockMarket
    Current overall market sentiment bias.
    marketCapLabel - Variable in class ArrowPanel
    Displays calculated market capitalization.
    MarketObserver - Interface in Unnamed Package
    Interface for observers that want to be notified about changes in the market state.
    MarketPrice - Variable in class StockMarket
    The current price of the stock in the market.
    marketStateLabel - Variable in class ArrowPanel
    Displays current state of the market (e.g., Stable, Crashing).
    Matrix - Class in Unnamed Package
    The class that is responsible for running the simulation.
    Matrix() - Constructor for class Matrix
     
    MAX_COOLDOWN - Static variable in class Buyer
    Maximum cooldown time (in milliseconds) between trades for a very passive buyer.
    MAXVALS - Variable in class ArrowPanel
    Maximum number of historical values stored for rendering.
    message - Variable in class ScrollingNews
    The text content of the news message.
    MIN_COOLDOWN - Static variable in class Buyer
    Minimum cooldown time (in milliseconds) between trades for a highly active buyer.
    mouseDragged(MouseEvent) - Method in class ResizeListener
    Resizes the frame based on the mouse drag movement and the edge that was grabbed.
    mousePressed(MouseEvent) - Method in class ResizeListener
    Records the mouse position and determines the edge being dragged.
